home.heroTitle: The reliable way to hire a tradesperson
home.heroSubtitle: Post your project for free and receive quotes from verified tradespeople
home.whyChooseSubtitle: Your projects deserve reliable, available and trustworthy tradespeople. With ArtisanDispo, everything starts smoothly
home.freeQuotesItem1: Receive multiple quotes with no commitment
home.clientDescription: Find the ideal tradesperson for your work. Compare quotes and choose with confidence.
home.artisanDescription: Join our platform and grow your business. Free registration, commission only on completed services.

signup.legalRepresentativeHelper: Must match the name on your business registration
signup.termsConsent: and consent to the use of my personal data

dashboard.verifyEmailTitle: Verify your email to unlock all features
dashboard.verifyEmailMessage: Some features are limited until you verify your email (contract signing, secure payment).

artisan.profileInvisible: Your profile is invisible until your email is verified. Clients cannot find you. Check your mailbox and click the verification link.
artisan.checkSpam: Also check your Spam/Junk folder if you don't find the email in your inbox.
artisan.profileNotVisible: Your profile is NOT VISIBLE in searches
artisan.decennaleRequired: Your trades ({{trades}}) require mandatory ten-year insurance. Until this document is validated by our team, your profile remains invisible to clients.
artisan.decennaleMustUpload: You must upload your ten-year insurance certificate for your profile to be activated.
artisan.decennaleReview: Our team is reviewing your document. You will be visible once validated (within 24-48h).
artisan.completeVerification: Complete your verification to unlock all features
artisan.completeProfileInstructions: To complete your profile, you must first verify your identity (SIRET, phone) and upload KBIS, ID card and professional liability insurance in "My Documents".

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.refusedQuoteCleanup: Refused quotes: Automatically deleted after 24 hours.
quotes.cancelledQuoteCleanup: Cancelled quotes: Automatically deleted after 24 hours (client withdrew after accepting the quote, before payment).
quotes.revisionQuoteCleanup: Quotes under revision: Immediately deleted after variant creation.
quotes.quoteHighlighted: The quote is highlighted below with an orange border
quotes.cancelQuoteWarningMessage:
By cancelling this quote, your request will be PERMANENTLY CLOSED.

CONSEQUENCES:
‚Ä¢ The craftsman has already scheduled your project in their calendar
‚Ä¢ You will no longer be able to receive quotes for this request
‚Ä¢ Other received quotes will remain cancelled
‚Ä¢ To restart this project: create a NEW request

This action is IRREVERSIBLE.

Are you CERTAIN you want to cancel this quote?
quotes.cancelQuoteSuccessMessage:
Your request has been permanently closed.
Craftsman {{artisanName}} has been notified of your withdrawal.

To restart this project, create a new request from your dashboard.
quotes.invoicesComingSoon: Invoice management will be available soon

bankConfig.securityNote: üîí Maximum security: Your banking details are never stored in our database

pending.title: ‚è≥ Verification in Progress

active.title: ‚úÖ Bank Account Verified

active.autoTransferInfo: üí° Automatic transfers: Funds are transferred by Stripe within 2 business days after validation
active.modifyIban: üîí Modify your IBAN? For security reasons, you must contact support.

rejected.title: ‚ùå Verification Failed

decennale.description: For structural work trades (masonry, roofing, carpentry, etc.), the law requires ten-year insurance covering the work for 10 years after completion. Providing the certificate is essential to be verified on the platform.

dialogs.deleteError: Error during deletion. Please try again.

Why do you want a quote revision?

dialogs.revisionSuccess:
Request sent to {artisan}.

The tradesperson will be notified and can send you a revised quote.

expirationHelp.title: How does request expiration work?
expirationHelp.subtitle: Understand why your requests close automatically

intro.title: üí° Why automatic expiration?
intro.description: To ensure tradespeople have enough time to visit your site and send you quality quotes, while avoiding obsolete requests.

normal.title: üìÖ Case 2: Normal work (7 to 30 days)
normal.note: ‚úÖ Tradespeople have 15 days to send quotes

distant.title: üìÜ Case 3: Distant work (more than 30 days)
distant.expirationValue: Maximum cap of 30 days after creation

why5Days.question: Why minimum 5 days?
why5Days.answer: Tradespeople need 2-3 days to visit your site and 1-2 days to write a detailed quote. You then have time to compare multiple offers.

expired.question: My request has expired, what should I do?
expired.answer: Create a new request with updated dates. You can reuse the photos and descriptions from the old request.

extend.question: Can I extend a request?
extend.answer: No, to ensure request freshness. Simply create a new request if necessary.

quickModal.title: üìÖ Quick period selection
quickModal.instructions: Click on a start date, then on an end date
quickModal.errorNoDate: Please select a start and end date
quickModal.errorInvalidRange: Start date must be before end date

editModal.contractWarning: This period is automatically generated from a signed quote.
editModal.contractNote: It cannot be modified or deleted manually. To make changes, please modify the corresponding quote.
editModal.deleteContractError: Cannot delete a contract period.\n\nThis period is automatically generated from a signed quote and cannot be modified or deleted manually.

errors.profileIncomplete: You must first complete your artisan profile.
errors.contractEditError: üîí This event is linked to a signed contract and cannot be modified.\n\nContracts automatically create unavailabilities for their dates.
errors.contractModifyError: üîí Cannot modify a contract period.\n\nThis period is automatically generated from a signed quote and cannot be manually modified.
